hero.description: Our partner hotels offer business tours and market insights to business leaders

hotelPreview.shortDes: Find Business Hotels with Local Market Insights.

banner.title: Are you taking your business abroad
banner.shortDes: Find hotels with in-house consultants to walk you through.

facts.title: Business Facts
facts.shortDes: Our journey in numbers and highlights.

steps.title: Seamless Booking Experience
steps.description: Guests receive curated options for business tours relevant to their industry with detailed insights on local industries, tour agendas, and networking opportunities.

steps.title: Personalized Itinerary and Pre-Tour Insights
steps.description: During tours, guests get personalized itinerary and in-depth insights on key industry trends, consumer behavior, and the relevant local markets.
steps.descriptionTwo: Guests can access market overviews and industry analysis to prepare for valuable engagements.

steps.title: Effortless Check-In and Tour Assistance
steps.description: At check-in, our consultants are ready to help you settle in, access relevant resources and contact exchanges to deepen networking and understanding of the markets, thereby maximizing the business potential of each experience.

meetOurPartner.title: Meet Our Partners
meetOurPartner.shortDes: Introducing the partners who help us elevate your stay
